content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, with easy access to all important facilities like supermarkets and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for at least 2000 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a very interesting price, Mister Schmidt. Can you tell me if there's any flexibility with the price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm willing to negotiate, Maryam. But remember, the apartment is in high demand due to its prime location. So, I'm not willing to come down much. Let's hear your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that the location is quite attractive, Mister Schmidt. I'm prepared to offer 1900 Euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the size and the fact that it's unfurnished.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Maryam. However, I'm afraid that's not enough for me. The apartment's location and the surrounding facilities make it a valuable asset. I'm willing to go down to 1950 Euros per month, but that's my final offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your final offer is 1950 Euros per month, Mister Schmidt? I'll need to think about it. Could you provide me with some time to consider this?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Of course, Maryam. Take your time. I'm confident that you'll see the value of my apartment and agree to my price. Remember, the apartment won't be available for long.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll let you know my decision soon. In the meantime, could you provide me with any additional information about the apartment?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Sure, Maryam. The apartment is on the third floor of a secure building with an elevator. The kitchen is modern and equipped with a stove, fridge, and microwave. The bedroom is spacious and can easily accommodate a king-sized bed. There's also a balcony with a nice view of the city. Please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the additional information, Mister Schmidt. I'll take into account the amenities when making my decision. I'll get back to you by the end of the day. Is that acceptable to you?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Yes, that's perfectly acceptable, Maryam. I look forward to your decision.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. I've considered your offer and the additional information you've provided. I'm prepared to meet you halfway. I agree to the price of 1925 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to meet halfway, Maryam. However, I'm afraid 1925 Euros per month is not acceptable to me. I've already lowered my price to 1950 Euros per month, and that's as low as I can go.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. I'll need to reconsider my options. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this time. I'll let you know if I change my mind. Thank you for your time.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Maryam. I wish you the best of luck in your search for an apartment. If you have any more questions about mine, feel free to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and the information you've provided. I'll be in touch if I have any more questions or if I decide to proceed with your offer. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
